name: Humpty Dumpty: The Quest of Limbs
name_original: Humpty Dumpty: The Quest of Limbs
description:
This game is about Humpty Dumpty where he enters another reality and loses all his limbs after "falling of the wall". He then goes to a quest to find potions to regenerate his limbs.

Use arrow keys or 'A' and 'D' to move.

Use Space to jump

Green is walkable land.

Red is dangerous area, where you die

Blue area is trampoline.

Good Luck for finding the potions!

Drive link for the assets : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1tc_suV1vyK8mc9X_NquiKdysolNYy2dT?usp=sha...
*NOTE* all assets used (including the graphics and audio clips) are made by us only
